name: FARM 64
description:
Born to farm. Doomed to Harvest.

A demonic curse has taken over your farm and possessed your new harvest and all the farm equipment. The only option left is to arm yourself with your trusty scythe and fight your way through the hordes to take back your farm!

  • Battle through waves of demon corncobs and possessed lawn mowers
  • Plant and harvest mysterious crops that give you valuable resources and life energy
  • Endure incessant taunting
  • Unlock and take back the areas of your farm to get the upper hand on the evil hordes
  • Seek out ancient farming tools to achieve maximum power
  • Harvest the hordes and deposit their remains into your silo for bonus points
  • Become the ultimate farmer by reaching the top spot on the leaderboard

…But watch out for your tractors. They’re big. They’re fast. And for some reason, they can really hold a grudge.

We hope you enjoy FARM 64, a COD Zombies/DOOM crossover for corn lovers and corn haters alike.

All original soundtrack and SFX!! Controls:

Gamepad supported!

ActionMKBControllerMoveWASDLeft StickJumpSpaceAAttackLeft ClickRight TriggerDodgeRight ClickLeft BumperInteractEXPlantE + (Move mouse and release)X + (D Pad)Swap WeaponScroll WheelYSpecific Weapon1/2/3D PadQuipV or Mouse 5Right Bumper Credits
